dict.string: en
BookSmart
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
$(PRODUCT_NAME)
APPL
$(CURRENT_PROJECT_VERSION)
This app requires access to your music library to play and manage your music.
This app requires Bluetooth access to connect to and communicate with nearby devices.
This app requires Bluetooth access to communicate with peripheral devices such as headphones or smartwatches.
This app requires access to your calendar to add, view, and modify events.
This app requires access to your calendar to add events, but will not access any other information.
Access to camera is required to capture photos needed for your profile and shift's timesheet.
This app requires access to your contacts to allow you to send messages and make calls to your contacts.
This app requires access to Face ID to authenticate your identity for secure login.
We need access to documents to allow you to upload files.
We need access to files from your document provider.
We need your location to provide personalized content and updates based on your location.
We need your location while you use the app to show relevant content and suggestions.
We need your location to improve your experience.
We need access to save images to your photo library.
We need access to your photo library to upload images.
This app requires access to your microphone to record audio for voice messages or video calls.
This app requires access to your reminders to create and manage reminders on your behalf.
This app requires access to speech recognition to transcribe voice into text.
This app requires access to your motion sensors to track activity and detect movement.
This app requires access to Siri to allow voice-based commands and interaction with the app.
We use this to provide notifications and improve your experience.
We use your data to send you notifications related to the app.
Light
Your app uses push notifications to keep you updated.
This app uses the local network to communicate with development tools like Metro.
